docs.title: Draw Steel Elements Obsidian Plugin
docs.text:
Draw Steel Elements is a plugin for Obsidian, a markdown note-taking tool that can be very helpful for TTRPG prep and play.

  • Draw Steel Elements Plugin Install
  • Draw Steel Elements Documentation

docs.title: Draw Steel Data
docs.text:
Parsed variants of the Draw Steel rules and bestiary are distributed across several repos. These repos are still under construction.

There is also an npm module for parsing and working with these models here:

  • Github - data-sdk-npm
  • npmjs.com - steel-compendium-sdk

Don't know which markdown to download?

  • If you're using Obsidian with the Draw Steel Elements plugin, use data-md-dse.
  • If you want the markdown for any other purpose, you want data-md.

docs.title: Unified (Everything)
docs.text:
These repos contain data aggregated from all the other repos (Adventures, Bestiary, and Rules)

  • data-md: Markdown
  • data-md-dse: Markdown for Draw Steel Elements Obsidian Plugin
